paper_abstract: Let F(q2)((2 nu+ delta)) be a (2 nu + delta)-dimensional unitary space of F(q2), where delta = 0 or 1. In this paper we construct a family of inclusion matrices associated with subspaces of F(q2)((2 nu+ delta)), and exhibit its disjunct property. Moreover, we compare the ratio efficiency of this construction with others, and find it smaller under some conditions.
paper_title: Pooling designs associated with unitary space and ratio efficiency comparison
